headline: Navan Announces Launch of Initial Public Offering Roadshow
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., October 21, 2025--Navan, Inc., an all-in-one business travel, payments, and expense management platform, today announced the launch of the roadshow for its proposed initial public offering of 36,924,406 shares of its Class A common stock. The offering consists of 30,000,000 shares of Class A common stock being offered by Navan and 6,924,406 shares of Class A common stock being offered by existing stockholders (the "Selling Stockholders"). headline: Broadridge Financial Solutions Earnings Preview: What to Expect
summary: Broadridge Financial is gearing up to announce its first-quarter results in the upcoming weeks, and analysts expect a notable double-digit surge in earnings.
